word:
I have no conscience-stricken feelings in regard to the money invested in your house. It is not any too 


                                     -215- 

large, and it is, I think, plenty good enough. I shall now feel that my duty in this respect is done. I can present this to the Lord, and give it over to Him in perfect faith, for I have done my best. It may be that you would have made some changes, but as you were not here, we have done the best we could.
